data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Darkwoulfe's Volume 27 - Things that go Bump Pack 3 (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
Darkwoulfe's Token Pack Volume 27 - Things that go Bump Pack 3


This token pack consist of 28 uniquely designed, 3D rendered VTT tokens, depicting various creatures of the night (Vampires, Specters, Hags, Witches and Scarecrows).

These tokens are suitable for use with any fantasy roleplaying game and are optimized for virtual table top (VTT) play. Darkwoulfe's token packs help you fill your game session with character!

This Token Pack includes:

  • 2 Banshee
  • Cave Hag
  • 2 Coffins
  • Empty Trellace
  • Green Hag
  • Hanging Potato Sack Scarecrow
  • Hanging Pumpkinhead Scarecrow
  • 3 Lagoon Monsters
  • Night Hag
  • 2 Potato Sack Scarecrow
  • 3 Pumpkinhead Scarecrows
  • 4 Specters
  • 5 Vampire spawn
  • Witch of the Woods

Released on February 17, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
